servinfo.title: Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:J24B

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Guide
servinfosub.ptxt: Check sliding surface of timing chain guide (1) for wear or damage.
If abnormality is found, replace timing chain guide.

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Tensioner
servinfosub.ptxt: Check sliding surface of timing chain tensioner (1) for wear or damage.
If abnormality is found, replace timing chain tensioner.

servinfosub.title: Crankshaft Timing Sprocket
servinfosub.ptxt: Check sprocket teeth for wear or damage.
If abnormality is found, replace crankshaft timing sprocket.

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain
servinfosub.ptxt: Check timing chain for wear or damage.
If abnormality is found, replace timing chain.

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Tensioner Adjuster
servinfosub.ptxt: Check that tooth surfaces (1) are free from damage.
If abnormality is found, replace timing chain tensioner adjuster.
